title: Online banking
content: Hi I was experiencing some difficulties logging into the app contacted the bank many times and the AI was useless as I wanted to contact an agent however the AI thought they knew best. Clearly not. After a week of not being able to log in I finally got through an agent whose name was kacper who was great and understood my situation and helped me through it. However that took an hour of my spare time and thankfully got compensated for the inconvenience for me. But kacper was great he needs to be recognised. I love how the bank handled my situation however the situation should not happen in the first place

title: App was great, now bad
content: What on Earth have Lloyds done to the banking app? It used to be well laid out and clear, now it‚Äôs a cluttered mess. Why so many tabs? Why the juvenile graphics? The font use for the digits may have last been seen in something knocked out by Johannes Gutenberg. If only you‚Äôd proactively asked us what could have been improved with the old app.
